title: Chao Shiqi Xingqiu Lixian Ji
synopsis: Maiquan cocoa and puppy meatballs happened to meet a "dog" named Yuball at Hemudu, and the fishballs and meatballs immediately became good friends. One day, the fish balls suddenly disappeared. While looking for the fish balls, Maiquan Coco and Puppy Meatballs learned that the fish balls were actually cosmic creatures, and the parent star of the fish balls, the Superstone planet, was plotting to invade the earth. In order to retrieve the fish balls and defend the earth, Maiquan Cocoa and Puppy Meatballs flew to the universe on the Dayang Mei spacecraft. Through the joint efforts of everyone, the aggression plan of the Superstone Planet was terminated, and mankind finally avoided a catastrophe. At this time, Yuball had to say goodbye to Maiquan Coco and Puppy Meatball. (translated form baidu baike)
